other_tests.findings: Symptoms of OCD began to improve 1 week after surgery; dramatic improvement in PD and OCD symptoms 6 months post-surgery. Preoperative Yale-Brown Obsessive-Compulsive Scale score was 32, which reduced to 1 postoperatively.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Motor and OCD symptoms improved dramatically after surgery. The improvements remained stable 1 year post-surgery; no additional antiparkinsonian drugs were administered.
